subject: Welcome to FCTE2014, ShenzhenChina! Related to Communication Technology topics,Recommendation to SCI and EI journals
body:
FCTE
 2014


2014 International Conference Future
  Communication Technology and Engineering


l
 
FCTE2014 will be held
  from November 16-17, 2014, in Shenzhen, China;


l
 
All accepted papers
  will be published by

CRC Press
-a member of Taylor
  & Francis Group
.


l
 
The proceedings will be indexed by

EI Compendex, ISI (CPCI, ISTP), Scopus and so on.
.


l
 
Excellent papers will be
  
recommended to 
SCI / EI
 
journals

  after the conference.


Topics details please view at:
 
http://www.fcte2014.org/cfp.htm


More details please turn to the homepage of FCTE2014:
 
http://www.fcte2014.org/
 




Submission deadline

September 15th, 2014



Submission via email

fcte2014@163.com
